DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe . The aim trial evaluate optimal dose condition semaglutide ( long act GLP-1 analogue ) healthy male subject .
DOC.brief_title: Investigation Optimal Dosing Conditions Long Acting GLP-1 Analogue Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Good general health judge investigator , base medical history , physical examination , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , vital sign clinical laboratory Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.530.0 kg/m^2 ( inclusive ) Males sexually active surgically sterilise , whose partner ( ) : a. use adequate contraceptive method ( e.g . condom spermicidal foam/gel/film/cream contraceptive Pearl Index 1 % , implant , injectables , combine oral contraceptive , hormonal intrauterine device diaphragm + spermicide ) b. refrain sexual intercourse trial 30 day follow last dose trial medication . In addition , subject must donate sperm duration trial 30 day follow last dose trial medication c. sterilization either partner Suffer life threaten disease history clinically significant disease disorder History acute idiopathic chronic pancreatitis Calcitonin value equal 50 ng/L Any clinically significant abnormal laboratory test result ( haematology , biochemistry urinalysis ) , judge investigator follow laboratory safety result ( base screen result ) : Amylase , lipase creatinine , upper normal range . Aspartate aminotransferase ( ASAT ) , alanine aminotransferase ( ALAT ) gammaglutamyltranspeptidase ( gammaGT ) 1.5 time upper normal range ( UNR ) .
